marklogic.body:
So great to hear from you!
Beautiful in the shade.... Thermometer on the bike computer was reading 99 degrees in the sun around 2p this afternoon. I think the asfault makes the Heat much worse than the weather report otherwise indicates.
The nights cool Off pretty good. Usually I can atleast wear a hat or sweater while I prepare morning oatmeal and coffee.
...just tonight I was telling Courtney how bad I want to do this with Jesse. But I don't know what more I can do to get him riding. I will try to email and bug him. Sometime.
Sent from phone
